hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #a Green Rupee# and #a Purple Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path to #Volvagia#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: Have you embraced the power of the Deku Nut yet?

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that racing #Dampé's ghost# rewards...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #a Heart Container#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides #Impa's cow cage#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #the Iron Boots#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #frozen cavern# echoes with #a Compass#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Epona's Song# can be found in #the Thieves' Hideout#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that ##Zora's River## has #3# major items.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #a Strength Upgrade#.
